S.FORM: Italy Gaga kska Owcow ka Italy, 42 50 N, 12 50 E ka gaga na nniqan. Kana ka knlbangan na o 301,340 sq km(hangan na o Tg72)(knlbanga dxgal o 294,140 sq km, knlbangan qsiya o 7,200 sq km). Kana ka sejiqun o niqan 62,007,540 hiyi. Gaga Rome ka pusu alang paru, jiyax 2 idas 6 ka jiyax skrayan klwaan. Manu ka dxgal Italy ga wada sugan 47.10 ka dxgal qpahan, 31.40 ka dxgal bbuyu, rahuq dxgal do niqan 21.50 na. Bukung klwaan ta sayang o kiya ka Sergio Mattarella, pnaah hngkawas2015 idas 2 jiyax 3pnrajing kmlawa klwaan.
